title: Widening the Gateway
article:
Continuous prayer from 1pm Sunday 26th April to 9pm Wednesday 29th April.

Plus praying online together each evening 8.00 to 9.00pm. 

Prayer pointers for all ages to follow. 

Sign up for your hour slot [here](https://www.signupgenius.com/go/8050948A4A62FA1F85-widening).
